#BeTheLight - Click HERE for more information
Welcome to Schulenburg ISD and to the 2019/2020 School Year. The Board of Trustees, Superintendent, students, staff, and community together hope that you and your family will consider us for your next school home. We are a rural community located almost equidistant between San Antonio and Houston on Interstate 10. Our rolling hills, trees and warm days make Schulenburg a great place to live and raise a family.

div.style: color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: tahoma, helvetica, san-serif; font-size: 12px; line-height: 20px; text-align: center;
div.span: We are very proud of the traditions established within the academic arena and extracurricular activities that lend to the rich history of Schulenburg ISD. We are fortunate to have low staff-to-student ratio and community support in all that we do. Our staff is student centered first and foremost and expects 110% effort from all members of the team.

div.style: color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: tahoma, helvetica, san-serif; font-size: 12px; line-height: 20px; text-align: center;
div.span: We invite you to call our central office at 979-743-3448, where someone will always be happy to answer any questions you may have.

div.style: color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: tahoma, helvetica, san-serif; line-height: 20px; text-align: center;
